dict.string: ${PRODUCT_NAME} needs access to provide event information to the MCP server.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs access to provide reminders information to the MCP server.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs access to provide contact information to AI assistants through the MCP server.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs access to provide location information to AI assistants through the MCP server.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs access to provide location information to AI assistants through the MCP server.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs to control other apps (Mail, Messages) to provide their functionality through the MCP server.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs screen recording permission to capture screenshots for AI assistants.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs microphone access for speech recognition features.
${PRODUCT_NAME} needs speech recognition to transcribe audio for AI assistants.
